summary: SMOKE CHARACTERISTICS(Rating Scale 1-7) (Ratings scale includes tobacco, menthol, spice, bitterness and harshness) Smoke is a mixture of tobacco and menthalm. Smoked tobacco has a high level of bitterness. It is also a stimulant.
